definition: to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: May have the opportunity to travel abroad, both relaxing and long exposure.

sentences.english: Seeing India at first-hand was a real education to me.
sentences.chinese: 親眼見到印度對我來說的確是一次大長見識的經歷。

sentences.english: And his chat is very happy, also opening mental horizon very much.
sentences.chinese: 和他的聊天很快樂，也很長見識。
